name: DD_DIA_CMS_START_2
description: This table contains data elements submitted for CMS ESRD patient registration forms (CMS-2728).

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: ALT_PHONE_AREA_CODE
columns.description: The area code of the dialysis patient's alternate phone number.

columns.name: ALT_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: The dialysis patient's alternate phone number without the area code.

columns.name: AKI_DX_BEFORE_ESRD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was diagnosed with an acute kidney injury (AKI) in the 12 months prior to starting ESRD therapy. 'Y' indicates the patient was diagnosed with AKI. 'N' indicates the patient was not diagnosed with AKI. 'UNKNOWN' or NULL indicates that it is not known whether the patient was diagnosed with AKI.

columns.name: AKI_DLYS_TREATMENT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether dialysis was required during the patient's acute kidney injury (AKI). 'Y' indicates that dialysis was required. 'N' or NULL indicates that dialysis was not required.

columns.name: PRIOR_HOME_DIALYSIS_OPTIONS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient received and understood options for a home dialysis modality prior to ESRD. 'Y' indicates the patient received and understood options for home dialysis. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient did not receive or did not understand options for home dialysis.

columns.name: PRIOR_TRANSPLANT_OPTIONS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient received and understood options for a kidney transplant prior to ESRD. 'Y' indicates the patient received and understood options for transplant. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient did not receive or did not understand options for transplant.

columns.name: LIVE_TRANSPLANT_EVALUATED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient received options for a living donor kidney transplant prior to ESRD. 'Y' indicates the patient received and understood options for a living donor kidney transplant. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient did not receive or did not understand options for a living donor kidney transplant.

columns.name: PRIOR_MED_MANAGEMENT_OPTION_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient received and understood options for active medical management without dialysis prior to ESRD. 'Y' indicates the patient received and understood options for not starting dialysis. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient did not receive or did not understand options for not starting dialysis.

columns.name: ADMISSION_TRANSPLANT_OPTION_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient understood options for a kidney transplant at the time of admission for chronic dialysis treatment. 'Y' indicates the patient understood options for a kidney transplant. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient did not understand options for a kidney transplant. 'N/A' indicates that the patient received and understood options for a kidney transplant prior to admission.

columns.name: ADMISSION_TRANSPLANT_RFL_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a patient was referred to a transplant center at the time of admission for chronic dialysis treatment. 'Y' indicates the patient was referred to a transplant center. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient did not receive a referral.

columns.name: ADMISSION_TRANSPLANT_RFL_DATE
columns.description: The date entered on CMS Form 2728 when the dialysis patient was referred to a transplant center.

columns.name: ADMISSION_TRANSPLANT_RFL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the transplant center where the dialysis patient was referred.

columns.name: ADMIT_HOME_DIALYSIS_OPTIONS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient understood options for home dialysis modalities at the time of admission for chronic dialysis treatment. 'Y' indicates the patient understood options for home dialysis modalities. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient did not understand options for home dialysis modalities. 'N/A' indicates that the patient received and understood options for home dialysis modalities prior to admission.

columns.name: PAT_HAS_LIVING_WILL_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has a living will or medical/physician order on file. 'Y' indicates the patient has a living will or a medical/physician order on file. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient does not have a living will or medical/physician order on file, or it is unknown whether the patient has a living will or medical/physician order on file.

columns.name: PAT_HAS_SHELTER_CNCRN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is concerned about where they will live over the next 90 days. 'Y' indicates the patient is concerned about where they will live over the next 90 days. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient is not concerned about where they will live over the next 90 days, or it is unknown whether the patient is concerned about where they will live over the next 90 days.

columns.name: CARE_GIVER_SUPP_DAILY_CARE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has caregiver support for daily care. 'Y' indicates the patient has caregiver support for their daily care. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient does not have caregiver support for their daily care, or it is unknown whether the patient has caregiver support for their daily care.

columns.name: CARE_GIVER_SUPP_DIALYSIS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has caregiver support for home dialysis or kidney transplant. 'Y' indicates the patient has caregiver support for home dialysis or kidney transplant. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient does not have caregiver support for home dialysis or kidney transplant, or it is unknown whether the patient has caregiver support for home dialysis or kidney transplant.

columns.name: CARE_GIVER_LIVE_WITH_PAT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient's caregiver lives with them. 'Y' indicates the patient 's caregiver lives with them. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient's caregiver does not live with them, or it is unknown whether the patient's caregiver lives with them.

columns.name: PAT_RELIABLE_TXPORT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has access to reliable transportation. 'Y' indicates the patient has access to reliable transportation. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient does not have access to reliable transportation, or it is unknown whether the patient has access to reliable transportation.

columns.name: PAT_UNDERSTAND_LIT_ENGLISH_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient understands health literature in English. 'Y' indicates the patient understands health literature in English. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient does not understand health literature in English, or it is unknown whether the patient understands health literature in English.

columns.name: PAT_NEED_ALT_EDUCATION_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient needs a different way other than written documents to learn about their health. 'Y' indicates the patient needs a different way other than written documents to learn about their health. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient does not need a different way other than written documents to learn about their health, or it is unknown whether the patient needs a different way other than written documents to learn about their health.

columns.name: PAT_NEED_TRANSLATOR_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient needs a translator to understand health information. 'Y' indicates the patient needs a translator. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient does not need a translator, or it is unknown whether the patient needs a translator.

columns.name: PAT_FIN_INSECURE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient finds it hard to pay for the very basics like housing, medical care, electricity, and heating. 'Y' indicates the patient is experiencing financial insecurity. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient is not experiencing financial insecurity, or it is unknown whether the patient is experiencing financial insecurity.

columns.name: PAT_FOOD_INSECURE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether within the past 12 months, the food the patient bought did not last and the patient didn't have money to get more. 'Y' indicates the patient is experiencing food insecurity. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient is not experiencing food insecurity, or it is unknown whether the patient is experiencing food insecurity.

columns.name: PAT_RISK_OF_VIOLENCE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether anyone, including the patient's family and friends, threatened the patient with harm or physically hurt them in the last 12 months. 'Y' indicates the patient is at risk of experiencing harm. 'N' or NULL indicates the patient is not at risk of experiencing harm, or it is unknown whether the patient is at risk of experiencing harm.
